Products

Specialist performance parts for the Kawasaki Ninja H2 platform.

Kawasaki Ninja H2 Parts & Kits

The Kawasaki Ninja H2 and H2R represent the pinnacle of production motorcycle engineering – a supercharged inline-four producing up to 310bhp in track-only trim. For those pushing these machines to their limits, we supply specialist components including dry sump conversion kits.

H2 Dry Sump Kit
Featured Product

Ninja H2/H2R Dry Sump Kit

Purpose-built oil system for serious track use and lightweight car conversions.

The stock H2 wet sump system works well for road use, but under sustained high-G loading – whether on track or in a lightweight car conversion – oil surge can become a reliability concern. Our dry sump kit eliminates this issue entirely.

Key Benefits

  • Oil Control – Constant oil supply regardless of G-forces or attitude
  • Increased Vacuum – Reduced windage losses mean more power to the rear wheel
  • Reliability – Eliminates oil starvation risk under extreme conditions
  • Flexibility – External tank can be positioned to suit your installation

Specifications

Fitment 2015-2024 Ninja H2, H2R, H2 Carbon
Pump Type 3-Stage Scavenge
Application Track / Race / Car Conversion

Contact us for pricing and availability. We can advise on installation and tank positioning for your specific application.

The Ninja H2 Platform

The Kawasaki Ninja H2 is a supercharged hypersport motorcycle producing 200bhp in road trim and up to 310bhp in the track-only H2R variant. The H2R holds the record for the fastest production motorcycle available.

The 998cc inline-four features Kawasaki's centrifugal supercharger – a piece of engineering developed across multiple divisions of the Kawasaki Heavy Industries group. The result is extraordinary power delivery with surprisingly linear throttle response.

For car builders, the H2 engine offers an incredible power-to-weight ratio in a compact, reliable package. With the right supporting modifications – including dry sump conversion – it's an excellent choice for lightweight sports cars and specials.

310 bhp H2R Maximum Power
998 cc Displacement
240 mph Top Speed (H2R)

Need H2 Parts?
